page.title: 07HOMELIFE -2
page.content: In the Kirkleatham Almshouses.({The {woman)}7am, get up.7.30am, make breakfast.8.50am, children to school.9am, do the pots, put the washing on, make the beds and go to college.3.30pm, get home,make tea.4.30pm, iron, finish other household jobs.7.30pm, get children ready for bed.8.30pm, children to bed, do homework or needlework, tidy round,watch T.V..10.30pm, all in bed. {The man}starts his day at 8am having breakfast then getting washed and showered.Depending on the weather he will either go to the greenhouse or into the garden.Then he goes shopping to Redcar by bus.He returns for his meals on wheels lunch.Afterwards, reads or gardens.He takes tea while watching The News, after which he reads,plays cards or does puzzles. Later he has supper and goes to bed.
